summary:
Automates daily project oversight by aggregating project and team data, leveraging anthropic models for advanced task and capacity analysis, and delivering resource rebalancing recommendations.  
Eliminates manual planning errors, surfacing bottlenecks, mismatches, and delays through proactive AI-driven insights.  
Integrates with project management systems, team databases, and notifies stakeholders with actionable updates.  
Customizable with adjustable estimation models and optional Slack alerts for urgent actions.  
Ideal for SaaS teams or consultancies juggling complex projects, boosting team utilization up to 25%, and identifying risks two to three weeks ahead.
